messages.message:
*Update for Log4J vuln situation*

*Current status:* 
1. Our investigation has not shown any impact beyond the ES service so far. 
2. We have implemented the patch advised by the ES community and it doesn’t require a new ES image to be shipped to any customer. The patch will be implemented using YAML file configuration flags (across platform releases). 
3. We will send the recommendation re: ES service to ALL the customers regardless of whether they use the image provided by us or their own. This is to make sure our customers take corrective action asap and are not impacted. 
*Action plan:* 
1. <mailto:hari@instabase.com|@Hari > <mailto:heymian@instabase.com|@Heymian > to confirm no impact for the pdf and table services, to corroborate the investigation done by Shaunak and Sudeep so far. 
2. Test the recommended patch changes on PRE sandbox - <mailto:alagarsamy.arunachalam@instabase.com|@alagar > (expected by *Monday 3pm IST)* 
3. Put together a recommendation update for ALL the customers using ES with Instabase - <mailto:alagarsamy.arunachalam@instabase.com|@alagar > <mailto:sudeep@instabase.com|@sudeep >
4. Share the advisory over email to the customer team and offer a call to answer any follow up questions. *(before Monday EoD EST) - Respective TAM*
Let us know if there are any questions.
